attributes.action: completely re-organise the Tax Credits system which is unfit for purpose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is anecdotal evidence that mistakes made by HMRC have affected thousands of tax-payers. It is clear to us that the whole tax credits and benefits systems are unfit for purpose
The whole system needs to be re-organised to be simple and fair, the government need to go back to the drawing board.  Anything other than current system would be better.
For example, we propose a system whereby;
1 Everyone is entitled to a minimum income, but out of that you must pay for everything benefits would previously have paid for. Housing, prescritions etc
2 For every child in a household there is a set amount
3 If you have a disability which results in an increase in cost of living (equipment/care), this is paid for by the government directly
4 For every pound you earn your tax credits income will be reduced by 50p
That way; 
1 It will be more beneficial to work
2 It will be more beneficial to live as a couple or in a family unit with two adults
3 It will be harder to falsely claim disability benefit
